meaningMnemonic: The <radical>sun</radical> AND the <radical>moon</radical> are out? With both their light-powers combined, it's incredibly <kanji>bright</kanji> outside.
readingMnemonic: When do things start to get <kanji>bright</kanji> outside? I'd say when things start getting sunny, and that is the month of <reading>May</reading> (めい). If you live in the Southern Hemisphere, it's bright in May because of all the snow, or because that's when all the streetlights come on.
